en.title: FE Welcomes World Renowned Scientist, Dr Emoto to Manila, Philippines!
en.content:
World Renowned Scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's "Scalar Energy and Live Water Seminar" at Philippine International Convention Centre Manila on 06th December 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1100 participants. Dr Masaru Emoto was interviewed on Cory Quirino's popular TV show "A Good Life" before the seminar. Among the speakers were Dr Siva,FE Medical Consultant and author of book "Optimum Energy For Peak Performance", Dr Romer and FE Founder Director KS Lee. FE's Country Licensee and PD Jeremy Looi together with PDs Pastor Arthur Medina and Engr Eliseo Demafelis performed demonstration of Quantum Pendant to the audience. PD Judge Lorenzo Veneracion shared his experiences with the audience.

Once again, a BIG THANK YOU to all who helped make the event a great success, not forgetting the dynamic duo, FE Leaders Dr Anarie Reyes and Effren Fortuna for doing a wonderful job MCing the event!

Next stop for Dr Masaru Emoto is Bangkok on 07th December 2008, with an anticipated crowd of 5000! SEE YOU AT THE TOP!
